title: Foreign tourists can now get driving licenses at BIA
byline: Foreign tourists arriving in Sri Lanka can obtain temporary driving licenses directly at the Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA) at Katunayake from today.

title: One injured in shooting in Matara
byline: A shooting incident was reported in the Kapugama area of Matara this morning (August 3), leaving one person injured, police said.

title: Veteran actor-comedian Madhan Bob passes away at 71 in Chennai
byline: Veteran actor and comedian Madhan Bob, also known as Krishnamurthy, died at 71 in Chennai on Saturday (August 2) evening. Known for his impressive work in Tamil cinema, the news of his demise has left fans in shock. He died at his Adyar residence after battling cancer for a few years, according to reports.

title: Former diplomat Invites Apparel Manufacturers to Capitalize on Strategic Trade Advantage with the USA via Kenya
byline: Former High  Commissioner to Kenya Kana Kananathan has  urged Sri Lankan apparel manufacturers to seize the tremendous opportunity presented by Kenya’s favorable trade terms with the United States and the African region.

title: Two Indian nationals arrested at BIA with Rs. 100 Mn worth of Kush
byline: Two Indian nationals were arrested at the Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA) in Katunayake while attempting to smuggle a large stock of Kush cannabis valued at approximately Rs. 100 million, police said.

title: President needs security and relaxation: Opposition MP
byline: The President needs security while he should enjoy recreation, Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) MP S.M. Marikar said today.

title: Validity of taxpayer PIN extended
byline: The Inland Revenue Department (IRD) has announced that the validity of the Personal Identification Number (PIN) issued to taxpayers has been extended until November 30.

title: Close associate of ’Dubai Sudda’ arrested
byline: A close associate of notorious underworld figure Prasad Chathuranga Kodagoda, also known as “Dubai Sudda,” has been arrested by the Panadura Division Crime Investigation Unit, police said.

title: Iran fully reopens airspace after ceasefire with Israel
byline: Iran has lifted all remaining restrictions on its airspace that were imposed at the onset of its 12-day conflict with Israel, the country’s Civil Aviation Organization (CAO) announced Saturday.

title: Namal slams govt over ‘politicization’ of Youth Services Council
byline: SLPP National Organizer Namal Rajapaksa has accused the government of politicizing the National Youth Services Council (NYSC) and suppressing independent youth activism, following the arrest of a district youth leader.
